headline: Verizon Communications (VZ) Valuation After Q4 Beat Share Repurchase Plan And Frontier Acquisition
summary: Verizon Communications (VZ) is back in focus after a packed Q4 update that paired stronger than expected financial results and record postpaid phone additions with a confident 2026 outlook and a large share repurchase plan. See our latest analysis for Verizon Communications. The Q4 surprise has clearly reset expectations, with the share price jumping 11.83% on the day of the announcement and contributing to a 12.37% 7 day and 9.87% 30 day share price return. Over a longer horizon, the 1 year...

headline: US Stock Market Today S&P 500 Futures Slip As Uneven Factory Data Weighs
summary: The Morning Bull - US Market Morning Update Monday, Feb, 2 2026 US stock futures are pointing lower this morning, with E mini S&P 500 contracts down about 0.7% and Nasdaq 100 futures off just over 1%, as investors weigh softer global manufacturing data against signs of resilient demand. Several manufacturing scorecards, including Italy at 48.1 and Spain at 49.2, are still below 50, which signals factories are running cooler, while parts of Asia such as Japan at 51.5 are showing early signs of...
